title: Al-Sadi on invasion of Songhai - conclusion

content.question: The first paragraph of the excerpt best supports which of the following conclusions about Timbuktu?

choices.label: It served as a center of learning in West Africa for many years.
Gender roles were important in maintaining the societyâ€™s history and cultural practices.
The Songhai empire was the earliest society to develop in West Africa.
The arrival of the Moroccans was part of the original Bantu linguistic expansion.

content.answer: It served as a center of learning in West Africa for many years.

skill.text: 1.A: Identify and explain course concepts, developments, and processes.
